definitions.definition: The setting, on a portable electronic device, that causes it to vibrate rather than sound any (or most) needed alarms.
definitions.example: Please put your cellphones on vibrate for the duration of the meeting.

definitions.definition: To shake with small, rapid movements to and fro.

definitions.example: Her mind was vibrating with excitement.

definitions.definition: To brandish; to swing to and fro.
definitions.example: to vibrate a sword or a staff

definitions.definition: To mark or measure by moving to and fro.
To affect with vibratory motion; to set in vibration.
